citizen.1: Hello, /player/. How are you doing today?
citizen.3: /player/, is your work going well recently?
citizen.4: /player/, do you know how to gain experience? I'm a newbie.
citizen.5: Hey, /player/, it's time to have some fun!

refugee.1: Hello, /player/. How are you doing today?
refugee.3: /player/, is your work going well recently?
refugee.4: /player/, do you know how to gain experience? I'm a newbie.
refugee.5: Hey, /player/, it's time to have some fun!

rebel.1: Hello, /player/. How are you doing today?
rebel.3: /player/, is your work going well recently?
rebel.4: /player/, do you know how to gain experience? I'm a newbie.
rebel.5: Hey, /player/, it's time to have some fun!

medic.1: Hello, /player/. How are you doing today?
medic.3: /player/, is your work going well recently?
medic.4: /player/, do you know how to gain experience? I'm a newbie.
medic.5: Hey, /player/, it's time to have some fun!

citizen.2: Hope to get off work early.

rebel.1: I'm running low on ammo, need to use it sparingly... I hope the supplies arrive on time.
rebel.2: This damn gun jammed! Do you have spare parts?
rebel.3: Hey, have you seen my gas mask?
rebel.4: Don't let your guard down, the Combine could strike back at any time.
rebel.5: I'm tired of eating canned food, I really want to taste fresh vegetables.
rebel.6: Do you have matches? I want to relax with a smoke.
rebel.7: Who's on guard duty tonight? I need a good night's sleep.
rebel.8: This damn radio can only pick up the Combine's political propaganda, I really want to hear the news from outside.
rebel.9: Hey, have you played the old arcade machine at Black Mesa Base? That's a classic!
rebel.11: This damn weather is so cold, if only I had a thick coat.
rebel.12: Do you have a deck of cards? Let's play a couple of games to pass the time.
rebel.13: This coffee is really bad, but it's better than nothing.
rebel.14: Hey, have you heard? They say there's a bar in the underground of City 17.
rebel.15: One day, we'll make the Combine pay for their blood debt!
rebel.16: We're not alone in this fight, the whole world is supporting us!
rebel.17: This damn map is so hard to understand, where the hell are we?
rebel.18: This damn place is so quiet, it's so quiet it's scary.
rebel.19: I think I heard a strange sound, did you guys hear it?
rebel.20: This damn boot is soaked again.
rebel.21: Do you know what time it is?
rebel.22: Be careful! Don't touch my weapon, it's my lifeline!
rebel.23: Do you have a razor? My beard has grown out.

medic.2: There is a smell of blood here.
medic.3: I hope the fighting ends soon.

combine.1: Stay alert, the rebels could be lurking in any corner.
combine.2: Any breach of discipline will be severely punished.
combine.4: This damn place is so boring, I really want to go back to base and rest.
combine.5: Do you have military gum? I'm a little tired.
combine.6: This patrol route is really long, when will it end...
combine.7: I slept on the broken floor last night and my back hurts.

medic.4: Do you want to get a few more holes, /victim/?
medic.5: I've been wanting to kill you on /map/ for a long time, /victim/.

metrocop.3: Do you want to test the law?
metrocop.5: Don't move, I'm going to shoot.

citizen.3: Looks like /victim/ isn't doing well today~

refugee.1: Looks like someone's got to collect /victim/'s body.
refugee.3: Haha, /victim/, you should be careful next time!

rebel.2: This hit is specially prepared for /victim/!
rebel.3: Looks like you're just good at talking, /victim/.

combine.3: This is the consequence of opposing the Combine, /victim/.
combine.8: Your weapons are like toys, vulnerable.

greeting.4: What have you been busy with lately, /name/?
greeting.5: You seem to be in a good mood, /name/.

trade.1: What good stuff do you have here?
trade.3: Do you have anything for sale, /name/?
trade.4: I need to buy your stuff, /name/.
trade.5: I heard you have good items that others don't?
trade.6: I want to take a look at your goods.
trade.7: Hi, /name/, do you have any good stuff for sale today?
trade.8: I'm very interested in your goods.
trade.9: Can you introduce your products to me?
trade.10: I hope to find something special.
trade.11: Do you think today's trade will go smoothly?

leave.9: I'll treat you to a drink in a few days.
